A6020.changelog:
- Blacklisted google hotword service to fix mic issues
- Enabled audiosphere effect by default
- Fixed FM radio
- Fixed postprocessing daemon crashes
- Misc changes for infra

X00T.changelog: Fixed audio recording in newer gcam mods like MGC 8.1

beryllium.changelog:
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!

2021-01-14:
!!!WARNING!!!
REQUEST ONLY CLEAN FLASH

- Switch FBE and drop FDE (enable force encryption)
- Update display, graphics, wfd and media blobs to R
- Update display/audio/media hals to sdm710 R
- Fixed WFD
- Fixed "Ok, Google" with screen off
- Switch to aidl Light HAL and update values
- Fixed color display problems in some apps
- Many fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Don`t flash on previous build dirty, will bootloop and drop data.

chiron.changelog:
- added Gcam from AOSP-11 for Sagit
- undervolted CPU

cmi.changelog:
Rounded corners without jagged
Better 5G network support
Add refresh rate switch
Fix the problem that the recorded voice is too small
Improve SQL performance a little bit
More adjustments waiting for you to discover

davinci.changelog:
15/02/2021
-Fixed FOD after WFD (the screen will bright up for recognizing the fingerprint after using WFD, but works. A reboot will restore the normal behaviour as usual)
-Switched to perf kernel
-Updated blobs to MIUI 21.2.3
04/02/2021
-Fixed screeen off FOD with ambient display disabled
03/02/2021
-Added compatibility with stock camera libraries (for MIUI camera, for example)

Notes:
- Recommended firmware is MIUI 20.10.20 or higher (China Beta)
- Minimum firmware is MIUI V12.0.5.0
- Recommended recovery is the OFFICIAL TWRP

gauguin.changelog:
- Fix fp sensor causing touch events.
- Start shipping with NFC.
- misc tweaks & changes.

Here be dragons!!

lavender.changelog:
- Enable SmartCharging
- Moved XiaomiParts to System/XiaomiParts
- Audio improvements
- Use GCamGoPrebuilt instead of Snap/Camera2
- Fix Deepsleep while Bluetooth is turned on
- Enable QPower and Deep sleep at the same time
- Cleanup Wifi and Tether rro_overlays
- Cleanup Wifi packages
- Address Camera Denials
- Address Radio Denials
- GPS Cleanup
- Enable VR Hal
- Update Build FP for February SPL

lmi.changelog:
- Firmware and vendor require V12.2.1.0.RJKCNXM.

- Device: https://github.com/ArrowOS-Devices/android_device_xiaomi_lmi/commits/arrow-11.0
- Blobs: https://github.com/ArrowOS-Devices/android_vendor_xiaomi_lmi/commits/arrow-11.0

miatoll.changelog:
• Enforcing build
• Added fully working MiuiCamera (except for curtana users)
• Fixed OK Google Hotword Enrollment
• Fixed BT audio codecs
• Enabled inline encryption (so yeah can flash R kernels)
• Added smartcharging

mido.changelog:
Note:
- These are still going to continue on 3.18 builds only.
- Requests for 4.9 builds will be ignored.

This decision has been taken as per the equal no.of requests from both sides of the parties and concluded by the outcome of adverse performance affects.

- Misc changes
- BT Fix
- Few SE Denials Defined
- WhatsApp QR Code Fixed

perseus.changelog:
- Fix kernel branch
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- It is required firmware part MIUI Q CN (Example V12.0.3.0.QEECNXM).

2021-01-14:

- Update display, graphics, wfd and media blobs to R
- Update display/audio/media hals to sdm710 R
- Fixed WFD
- Fixed "Ok, Google" with screen off
- Switch to aidl Light HAL and update values
- Switch Arrow kernel
- Many fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- It is required firmware part MIUI Q (Recommended V12.0.1.0).

phoenix.changelog:
- Kernel upstreamed to 4.14.214
- light: Properly scale brightness range
- light: Avoid uint32_t underflow
- decrease in-call volume a bit

polaris.changelog:
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!

2021-01-14:
!!!WARNING!!!
REQUEST ONLY CLEAN FLASH

- Enable force encryption
- Update display, graphics, wfd and media blobs to R
- Update display/audio/media hals to sdm710 R
- Fixed WFD
- Fixed "Ok, Google" with screen off
- Switch to aidl Light HAL and update values

Note:

sanders.changelog:

improved  performance
Enabled ZRAM by default

violet.changelog:
- Switched to Qti BT
- Updated blobs from VIOLETINGlobal_V12.0.5.0.QFHINXM
- Added Smart Charging overlay
- Added KCAL Support in Violetparts (Need to turn on & off Night light after every reboot to take effect for specified values)
- Upstreamed Display HAL to LA.UM.9.1.r1-07300-SMxxx0.0 caf tag (This fixed DRM and display logspams)
